about.description: Biovitam is an organic biofertilizer approved by KEPHIS (Kenya Plant Health Inspectorate Service) and engineered for maximum efficiency. Nova Gardens Limited is the sole distributor of Biovitam Biofertilizers in Kenya.
objectives: Enhance quick recovery from all crop stresses.
Promote foliage growth, massive flowering, and zero abortions.
Improve flower and fruit retention and rapid fruit expansions.
Strengthen resistance against fungal, bacterial, and viral diseases.
Support heat, frost, and water stress management.
Enhance fruit taste and ensures quick, uniform ripening.

processSteps.title: Raw Material Sourcing
processSteps.description: We utilize high-grade vegetal extracts and avian waste sources, carefully screened for purity and nutrient density.
processSteps.details: Our sourcing strategy prioritizes renewable organic matter that is naturally rich in primary nutrients and trace elements.

processSteps.title: Bio-Fermentation
processSteps.description: Proprietary fermentation technology that breaks down organic matter into bio-available forms.
processSteps.details: Using specific microbial strains, we ensure the complete conversion of complex molecules into easily absorbable nutrients.

processSteps.title: Bio-Fortification
processSteps.description: Enrichment with natural plant hormones, amino acids, and specific microbial biostimulants.
processSteps.details: This step introduces auxins, cytokinins, and essential amino acids that trigger vigorous root development and stress tolerance.

processSteps.title: Mineral Optimization
processSteps.description: Precision addition of Calcium, Magnesium, Boron, and Zinc to prevent common deficiencies.
processSteps.details: We calibrate the mineral balance to ensure zero antagonism, maximizing the efficacy of every drop.

processSteps.title: Quality Assurance
processSteps.description: Every batch undergoes rigorous lab testing for consistency, potency, and safety.
processSteps.details: Our standards exceed local regulatory requirements, ensuring that farmers receive only the highest quality biofertilizer.
